content.en: Renewable energy analysis: Algorithms are being used to analyze various research questions related to renewable energy technologies and the development of clean energy systems. They attribute the differences in renewable energy technology development between countries like Iran and the Netherlands to factors such as under-development and oil-dependency. Algorithms also suggest that the formation of technological innovation systems and the accumulation of system functions play a crucial role in the diffusion and adoption of clean energy technologies in different countries.
content.da: Analyse af vedvarende energi: Algoritmer anvendes til at analysere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til vedvarende energiteknologier og udviklingen af rene energisystemer. De tilskriver forskellene i udviklingen af vedvarende energiteknologi mellem lande som Iran og Nederlandene faktorer som underudvikling og olieafhængighed. Algoritmer antyder også, at dannelsen af teknologiske innovationssystemer og akkumuleringen af systemfunktioner spiller en afgørende rolle i udbredelsen og adoptionen af rene energiteknologier i forskellige lande.
